title: Apply uploaded logo across app (UI, favicon, OG image)

requirements.text: Generate a complete logo asset set from the uploaded image "Tech Repair Logo with Blue and Gray.jpg" and add the resulting images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames specified (logo, favicons, apple touch icon, and Open Graph image). Ensure the logo is centered, not distorted, and has enough padding to remain legible at small sizes.

quotes: I want to use this logo

acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames: kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png, kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png, kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png, kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png
All generated assets keep the logo proportions (no stretching) and appear visually centered with comfortable padding
Favicon assets are simplified/clear enough to be recognizable at 16x16 and 32x32

requirements.text: Use the generated logo assets throughout the UI and HTML head: ensure the header logo and landing page hero logo use /assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png, and ensure frontend/index.html references the generated favicon, apple-touch-icon, and og:image assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Site header displays the new logo image without layout breakage on desktop and mobile
Landing page hero displays the new logo image without distortion
frontend/index.html contains link tags for 16x16 and 32x32 favicon and apple touch icon, and meta tags for og:image pointing to the generated assets
No other legacy logo assets remain referenced in the UI or HTML head

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify immutable hook files: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Keep all assets served statically from frontend/public/assets/generated; do not route image loading through the backend.
No backend (Motoko) changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing app name, subtitle, or other branding text beyond updating logo imagery
Implementing new pages, features, or authentication changes
Altering service-request flow or backend data models

required: Square brand logo with transparent background, centered with comfortable padding (kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Square favicon, simplified and centered, transparent background (kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
Square favicon, simplified and centered, transparent background (kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png)
Apple touch icon, centered with padding (kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
Social preview image on a clean light background, logo centered and prominent (kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png)
